More Service Cloud Features

Decide which Salesforce Knowledge article widget is best for your organization.

Salesforce Knowledge is available in Essentials and the Unlimited Edition with Service Cloud.
Salesforce Knowledge is available for an additional cost in: Professional, Enterprise, Performance, and Developer Editions.
 
ARTICLE WIDGET	ARTICLE CASE FEED WIDGET	KNOWLEDGE ONE WIDGET
Filter on data category	Yes	No	Yes
Create an article	No	No	Yes
Search an external object	No	No	Yes
Access your draft articles	No	No	Yes
Attach an article to a case	Yes	Yes	Yes
Send an article as a PDF	No	Yes	Yes
Share an article’s public URL	No	Yes	Yes
Adjust with the window size	No	No	Yes
Have more than one way to suggest articles	No	No	Yes
title: Choosing the Right Salesforce Knowledge Article Widget
